name: Roo.data.DataProxy
desc:
This class is an abstract base class for implementations which provide retrieval of unformatted data objects.

DataProxy implementations are usually used in conjunction with an implementation of Roo.data.DataReader (of the appropriate type which knows how to parse the data object) to provide a block of {@link Roo.data.Records} to an {@link Roo.data.Store}.

Custom implementations must implement the load method as described in {@link Roo.data.HttpProxy#load}.

events.name: *load
events.desc: Fires before the load method's callback is called.

params.name: arg
params.desc: The callback argument object passed to the load function.

events.name: *beforeload
events.desc: Fires before a network request is made to retrieve a data object.

params.name: params
params.desc: The params parameter to the load function.

events.name: *loadexception
events.desc: Fires if an Exception occurs during data retrieval.

params.name: arg
params.desc: The callback argument object passed to the load function.
